item.title: Cava’s CFO on sustaining growth and developing future leaders amid consumer strain
item.description: The company is keeping prices steady while investing in people, says Tricia Tolivar.

item.title: The $1.3 billion startup that wants to tell you how to stop wasting time at work

item.title: Trump pardons Giuliani, Mark Meadows, others involved in effort to block 2020 election result, DOJ official says
item.description: The proclamation, posted online late Sunday, explicitly says the pardon does not apply to Trump.

item.title: Does international experience still matter for future CEOs?
item.description: Once a ticket to the top, global stints are being redefined in an era of AI, protectionism, and regional markets.

item.title: DeFi is creeping into corporate cash flow—‘The cat’s out of the bag’
item.description: More firms are thinking about parking spare cash in DeFi vaults that offer better yield and easier withdrawals.
